ButtonEnabled.name: Button Enabled
ButtonEnabled.description: Enables or disables the pause menu button to open the mod settings

PracticeReturn.name: Disabled in practice mode
PracticeReturn.description: Disables the mod from working in practice mode (may break with tinting)

AutoReturn.name: Automatically leave the level
AutoReturn.description: Automatically exits the level to your chosen menu upon completion

AutoReturnDelay.name: Auto Return Delay
AutoReturnDelay.description: How long between completing the level does it delay before exiting

TintMode.name: Visual
TintMode.description: Choose the type of visual to display when completing a level

CustomTintImage.name: Custom Image
CustomTintImage.description: The image to use when Tint Mode is set to Image

TintStyle.name: Visual Animation
TintStyle.description: Choose the animation type the visual follows

FadeInDuration.name: Fade In Duration
FadeInDuration.description: How long it takes for the visual to fade in

FadeOutDuration.name: Fade Out Duration
FadeOutDuration.description: How long it takes for the visual to fade out

TintColor.name: Visual Color
TintColor.description: The color to tint when you are able to click to leave the level

TintOpacity.name: Visual Opacity
TintOpacity.description: How visible the tint should be (0 = transparent, 1 = fully visible)

CustomCompletionAudio.name: Level Completion Audio
CustomCompletionAudio.description: The audio to play when you complete a level (Leave blank if you do not want a custom audio to play upon completing a level)

AudioVolume.name: Audio Volume
AudioVolume.description: How loud the completion audio is (0 = silent, 10 = loud)

AudioSpeed.name: Audio Speed
AudioSpeed.description: How fast the completion audio is

AudioStyle.name: Audio Settings
AudioStyle.description: Choose how the completion audio functions
